message.name: SCRIPT_ITEM
message.description: Message encoding a mission script item. This message is emitted upon a request for the next script item.
message.field: The name of the mission script, NULL terminated.

message.name: SCRIPT_REQUEST
message.description: Request script item with the sequence number seq. The response of the system to this message should be a SCRIPT_ITEM message.

message.name: SCRIPT_REQUEST_LIST
message.description: Request the overall list of mission items from the system/component.

message.name: SCRIPT_COUNT
message.description: This message is emitted as response to SCRIPT_REQUEST_LIST by the MAV to get the number of mission scripts.
message.field: Number of script items in the sequence

message.name: SCRIPT_CURRENT
message.description: This message informs about the currently active SCRIPT.
